forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost. Partly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 39 overnight. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost before 9am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. East northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 71. South southeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 37, with temperatures rising to around 40 overnight. Northeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Thursday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
